name: fovea
description: Fovea is a tool for generating tiny, incredibly powerful Web Components.

scripts.generate:readme: scaffold readme --blacklist intro,description,usage && lerna run generate:readme
scripts.generate:all: npm run generate:license & npm run generate:contributing & npm run generate:coc & npm run generate:readme
scripts.update:packages: lerna exec -- ncu -ua --reject '/fovea/' && lerna exec -- npm update && lerna exec -- npm install
scripts.update: npm run update:shared && npm run update:packages
scripts.prebootstrap: npm run codegen && npm run update
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.finalize: NODE_ENV=production npm run bootstrap && NODE_ENV=production npm run build && NODE_ENV=production npm run validate && npm run generate:all && git add . && git commit -am "Bumped version" || true
scripts.publish:patch: npm run finalize && NODE_ENV=production lerna publish patch --conventional-commits --yes
scripts.publish:minor: npm run finalize && NODE_ENV=production lerna publish minor --conventional-commits --yes
scripts.publish:major: npm run finalize && NODE_ENV=production lerna publish major --conventional-commits --yes
